turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm trying to order coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! did you have a location in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the Starbucks on Hollywood Boulevard closer to the Hollywood train or the Chinese Theatre.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, one moment. let me find it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, i found a location at 6933 Hollywood Blvd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Yeah, that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! what can i get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: two regular coffees, one of them Venti and then one of them a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what should the Venti coffee be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The venti coffee should be just regular hot coffee with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, they offer light, medium and dark roast, which would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a light roast.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, one second.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, a Venti blond coffee with a splash of whole milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, and what about the 2nd grande drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The grande, just don't put any milk on it. I just want it completely black, in the dark roast.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, a Grande Dark roast Coffee,

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no sugars, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No sugars.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, is that gonna be all?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, one moment while i send it over to Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you. You, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks! byebye.
